data.title: Laurence Harvey
data.text:
AKA Laruschka Mischa Skikne

Born: 1-Oct-1928

Birthplace: Jonischkis, Lithuania

Died: 25-Nov-1973

Location of death: London, England

Cause of death: Cancer - Stomach

Remains: Buried, Santa Barbara Cemetery, Santa Barbara, CA

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: England

Executive summary: Manchurian Candidate

Military service: South African Army

Starred in several major films including Manchurian Candidate. Born in Lithuania, Jewish but not practicing.

Wife: Margaret Leighton (actress, m. 1957, div. 1961)

Wife: Joan Perry (actress, m. 1968, div. 1972)

Wife: Pauline Stone (m. 1972, one daughter)

Daughter: Domino Harvey

University: Royal Academy of Dramatic Art

Lithuanian Ancestry

Jewish Ancestry

The Ceremony (18-Dec-1963)
